title: Hearts and Horses: Daily Inspirations for Equestrians
description: “Hearts and Horses” in its uniquely timeless format is filled with 365-day inspirational messages celebrating horses to inspire you with fresh insights everyday! If you are a horse lover or admirer of horses this book is for you. Follow Horses and Hearts on Pinterest and Facebook @horsesandheartskindness. Horses partner with the hearts of people building bonds of trust, strength, and understanding. Much of what we learn from horses is not really just about a horse. Horses teach us that a simple gesture of kindness can heal a life. They help us challenge our limits physically, emotionally, and in the cognitive areas of our lives. This book was written for those of us that while we live in a house our heart and true home is in the barn.
author: Mandy Costello
